title: colorplan font
content:
Hi, any help with the name of this typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112172954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Colorplan-homepage-animation_4580.jpg)
author: oystein

comments.content: This is [Colorplan](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112172954/http:/gdmaidstone.wordpress.com/2013/03/05/made-thought-rebrands-colorplan), exclusive typeface for GF Smith Colorplan, commissioned by [MadeThought](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112172954/http:/www.madethought.com/) and designed by [Colophon](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112172954/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/)
